name: Dreamworld (itch) (Burntbacon109)
description:
You are trapped in the dreamworld and your only chance of escape is to complete the challenges and solve puzzles.

This game was made for the Brackey's Game Jam 2022.1 - a week long game making adventure.

Creator Comment: So, this game is an utter mess. A tight time restriction due to ,you know, life, meant lots of ideas couldn't come to fruition and so lots of features were cut, many bugs were unable to be fixed and the game is left in a rather unfinished state. Still though, it was a fun experience and I think anyone interested in making games should try their hand at a game jam!
